name: Undermare
description:
Undermare is a horror game inspired by Doctor Who's Weeping Angels. It's a short singleplayer game where you have to find the way out of a gruesome metro station inspired in Madrid's metro system.

Remember to look at your enemies before they can reach you...

Good luck

Controls:
  • Move: W,A,S,D
  • Interact buttons: Left click
  • Mininimap: R / SpaceBar
  • Pause Menu: Esc

Quality settings are set to High by default, but you can change them to Low on the settings menu.

Extra:

If you find any bugs or misspelling on the game don't hesitate to tell us. We want the experience to be as fluent as possible.

Thanks for your support and for playing!
